content.query:
-- Sample query with OPENROWSET
-- This needs a pointer to the file location, format of the file

SELECT * 
FROM
OPENROWSET
(
    BULK 'https://mysnapsestorage01.dfs.core.windows.net/mycontainer/datafolder/profile.csv',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)

AS [result]
